title: Yashakiden: The Demon Princess Volume 2 (Novel)
description: A vicious vampire gang four thousand years in the making has awakened from its slumber in order to seize control of Demon City Shinjuku. Princess, Kikiou, Ryuuki, and Shuuran are as persistent as they are merciless, especially when the target of their attacks is Setsura Aki.
author: Hideyuki Kikuchi
